definition: to leave/to depart/to separate/to distinguish/to classify/other/another/don't ...!/to pin/to stick (sth) in

sentences.english: Asana make one firm, free from maladies, and light of limb.
sentences.chinese: 瑜伽姿態使人堅決，闊別疾病並領有輕巧的身體。

sentences.english: I returned to my native place after so many years. , but everything still seemed familiar to me.
sentences.chinese: 我回到闊別多年的故鄉，一切仍是那麼熟悉。

sentences.english: Keep flax from fire, youth from gaming.
sentences.chinese: 亞麻遠離火苗，青年闊別賭博。

sentences.english: Ye Lingqing clenched his fist, is Ye Lingqing away from home for a long time.
sentences.chinese: 葉凌青握緊拳頭，是葉凌青闊別已久的家。

sentences.english: Two brothers return to the home town they left years before.
sentences.chinese: 兩兄弟回到了闊別多年的家鄉。

sentences.english: Meeting her after so many years really blew my mind.
sentences.chinese: 闊別多年後又見到了她實在太令我喫驚了。

sentences.english: Keep away from direct sunlight and heat.
sentences.chinese: 闊別陽光直射及野生熱量。

sentences.english: I found some photos of interesting places which were not too far away from Chengdu.
sentences.chinese: 我發現一惟有趣的地方照片也就不太闊別成都。

sentences.english: Once again returned to my city after an absence of six years.
sentences.chinese: 一下子，又回到了我闊別六年的城市。

sentences.english: It seemed to him that he was already at an immense distance from life.
sentences.chinese: 他彷彿覺得他已闊別人生十萬八千里。

definition: to be separated (from a friend, one's homeland etc) for a period of time/after a hiatus of (x years)
to fight in one place after another
lit. to form an army/to set up (team, group, band, organization etc)/to found/opening (ceremony)/to commission (arms system, naval vessel)/to graduate from an apprenticeship
to continue in a post/(to hold a post) several times in succession/(to win a title) in successive years/to stay at number one/to defend a championship
to take a curtain call/(fig.) to come to an end
